heading: Pentecostalism.
general-note: Here are entered works on Christian movements, not limited to the Pentecostal churches, that emphasize the personal experience of the Holy Spirit in daily life and the gifts of the Holy Spirit, especially the gift of tongues. Works on all Christian denominations of the Pentecostal type, as well as works for which the particular Pentecostal body cannot readily be identified, are entered under. Pentecostal churches. Works on individual denominations of the Pentecostal type are entered under the name of the denomination..
